quote.text: With great power comes great electricity bill
quote.author: Dr. Who

about.title: background
description: Got my start in SaaS sales at an SMB. I learned how to sell.
Then, I moved to a marketing company at another SMB. I learned how to market.
Now, I am using the language of sales and marketing to help build communities and grow with startups.

contacts.title: whats-next
contacts.text: It looks like you were able to tolerate my page so far. If you want to chat, you know how to reach me. If not, thanks for your attention.

facts.title: fun-facts
list: I like winter more than summer
I often bike with my friends
My favorite movie is The Green Mile
